A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: All style with no substance. A visually beautiful movie that lacks story and any continuity with the Star Wars Universe. I walked out of the theatre not overly happy\, but not overly upset either\, just \"meh\". Upon reflection though\, this movie will make any fan (not Fanboy) of Star Wars furious. The \"Disney-fication\" of this universe is so apparent and off-putting\, I really don't know where they can go from here.
